Type guard function to check if a client is an Alchemy Smart Wallet Client.

## Import

```ts
import { isSmartWalletClient } from "@alchemy/wallet-apis";
```

## Parameters

### client

`Client`

- The client to check

## Returns

`boolean`
True if the client is an Alchemy Smart Wallet Client
